sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { OwlOptions } from 'ngx-owl-carousel-o'; @Component({ selector: 'app-main-slider', templateUrl: './main-slider.component.html', styleUrls: ['./main-slider.component.css'] }) export class MainSliderComponent { customOptions: OwlOptions = { loop: true, mouseDrag: false, touchDrag: false, pullDrag: false, dots: false, navSpeed: 700, navText: ['', ''], responsive: { 0: { items: 1 } } } }
